text: To be eligible, an individual shall:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-164, see notes following ยง 48-831.01.

DC CODE ยง 48-831.32

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Be a resident of the District;
Have a household income that is not more than 350% of the federal poverty level; and
Not be enrolled in any public or private medical insurance program.

chapter.text: Affordability of Prescription Drugs -- AccessRx Program.

part.text: AccessRx for Uninsured Residents of the District of Columbia.
